name: Bark in My Day
description: It's a warm, sunny day. The birds are chirping, the bones are missing, and all the sheep have escaped. Wait a minute. That's not supposed to happen! Play as Ripley, a good dog going about their day. But not all is as it seems. The sheep have gotten loose out of their pens, and the farm is damaged! Herd the sheep back to their rightful place, and grab a bone to celebrate your success. But what's that in the sky, and why are all the sheep suddenly disappearing? As resident dog, it's your job to find out, no matter where your journey ends up taking you!
